text: Yakhana allaha balalenah he isa ibane mariyama! Tumi ki lokaderake bale diyechile ye, allahake chere amake o amara matake upasya sabyasta kara? Isa balabena; apani pabitra! Amara jan'ye sobha paya na ye, ami emana katha bali, ya balara kona adhikara amara ne'i. Yadi ami bale thaki, tabe apani abasya'i parijnata; apani to amara manera katha o janena ebam ami jani na ya apanara mane ache. Niscaya apani'i adrsya bisaye jnata.
